HELP.PASS <password>: authenticate the user with a password
HELP.LIST: list the current directory of the server
HELP.CWD <directory>: change the current directory of the server
HELP.RETR <filename>: transfer a copy of the file FILE from the server to the client
HELP.STOR <filename>: transfer a copy of the file FILE from the client to the server
HELP.PWD: display the name of the current directory of the server
HELP.HELP: send helpful information to the client
HELP.QUIT: close the connection and stop the program
